description: This file defines a JavaScript module that provides a client function `sendChatPrompt` for interacting with the Perplexity AI chat API, supporting streaming responses via callbacks. It handles environment variable configuration for API keys, initiates a fetch request to the API, and processes streaming JSON data to deliver tokens and final responses.
external_files: fetch API (via browser environment or polyfill)

methods.name: sendChatPrompt({ prompt, onToken, onStart, onComplete, onError })
methods.description: An asynchronous function that sends a chat prompt to the Perplexity API, streams the response tokens, and invokes callback functions for each token, start, completion, or error events.

ctags.name: sendChatPrompt
ctags.pattern: /^export async function sendChatPrompt({ prompt, onToken, onStart, onComplete, onError }) {$/
